title: 땅콩이의 초밥 먹방 리뷰
prompt: 8K cinematic video. Same Pomeranian dog from previous videos wearing light blue floral bandana sits at table in Japanese restaurant. Empty plates visible. Dog looks satisfied after eating, speaks to camera with precise mouth movements matching each Korean syllable, then bursts into uncontrollable cute laughter at the end. Same dog appearance as Video 1, 2, 3. Warm lighting. No text. No subtitles. No watermarks.

dialogue.script: 스시 리뷰 결과요? 음... 저는 소고기가 더 좋아요

1.5_to_2.0_sec.mouth: 스: lips slightly apart with teeth close, 시: lips stretch wide

2.0_to_2.8_sec.mouth: 리: lips wide, 뷰: lips round forward, 결: mouth open then close, 과: open wide, 요: lips round with question rise

3.3_to_3.6_sec.mouth: 저: mouth open medium, 는: closes with tongue touch

3.6_to_4.4_sec.mouth: 소: lips round small O shape, 고: open then close, 기: lips stretch, 가: mouth open wide

4.4_to_5.2_sec.mouth: 더: mouth open, 좋: lips round then open, 아: wide open, 요: round closing

5.2_to_8.0_sec.audio: Uncontrollable cute baby giggling, continuous laughter
5.2_to_8.0_sec.mouth: Rapid open-close-open pattern, big smile, teeth showing, can't stop laughing
5.2_to_8.0_sec.expression: Eyes squint tight, whole face laughing, cracking up at own joke, losing it completely

ddangkong.tone: Thoughtful at 음, honest during review
ddangkong.laugh_style: Uncontrollable baby giggling burst, can't stop laughing, losing composure, infectious cute laughter

korean_mouth_shapes.소: Lips form small round O shape
korean_mouth_shapes.고: Mouth opens with back tongue, then closes
korean_mouth_shapes.기: Lips stretch sideways, teeth slightly visible
korean_mouth_shapes.더: Tongue touches roof, mouth medium open

visual.final_expression: Laughing so hard, eyes closed, mouth wide open, pure joy
